query.statement: SELECT A.ITEM_CODE AS ITEM_CODE, A.ITEM_NAME AS ITEM_NAME, A.ITEM_SIZE AS ITEM_SIZE, A.PO_UOM AS PO_UOM, --D.FEATURE_NAME AS ITEM_INFO, FN_ITEM_FEATURE_ICON( (SELECT DUTY_YN FROM HLDC_PO_CONTRACT_F WHERE ITEM_CODE = A.ITEM_CODE AND ROWNUM <= 1 ), A.PB_YN, A.ECO_ITEM, '') AS ITEM_INFO, NVL(B.MARGIN_PRICE,0) AS ITEM_PRICE, A.KG_CONVERT_RATE AS KG_CONVERT_RATE , DECODE(KG_CONVERT_RATE,0,0,ROUND((NVL(B.MARGIN_PRICE,0)/A.KG_CONVERT_RATE/1000),2)) AS G_ITEM_PRICE, C.DISUSE_RATE AS DISUSE_RATE ,DECODE(NVL(F.RESTRICT_SEQ,0),0,'N','Y') AS RESTRICT_YN --금지 ,F.RESTRICT_START, F.RESTRICT_END, F.RESTRICT_REASON --금지시작금지종료금지사유 ,A.ORIGIN_NAT FROM ( SELECT ITEM_CLASS2, ITEM_CLASS3, ITEM_CLASS4, ITEM_CODE , ITEM_NAME, ITEM_SIZE, PO_UOM, KG_CONVERT_RATE, ORIGIN_NAT, -- 표준에서는 어떻게 가져올지 추후 협의가 필요. 일단은 모두 'N'로 표시(센터별 기준업장으로 보여줄지는 협의가 필요) (2015.08.29) 'N' AS PB_YN, ECO_ITEM FROM HLDC_PO_ITEM_MST WHERE ITEM_CLASS1 = 'F' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ----- AND ITEM_CLASS2 =#ITEM_CLASS2# AND ITEM_CLASS3 =#ITEM_CLASS3# AND ITEM_CLASS4 =#ITEM_CLASS4# AND ITEM_NAME LIKE '%'|| #ITEM_NAME# ||'%' ----- ) A, FMI_STD_PRICE B, FSI_ITEM_NUT C, ( SELECT ITEM_CODE, (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'FS0033' AND CODE = ITEM_FEATURE) AS FEATURE_NAME FROM FSI_ITEM_FEATURE WHERE (ITEM_CODE, CDATE) IN ( SELECT ITEM_CODE, MAX(CDATE) AS CDATE FROM FSI_ITEM_FEATURE WHERE (1=1) AND (CENTER_CODE, CUSTCD, ITEM_CODE, APPLY_DATE) IN (SELECT CENTER_CODE, CUSTCD, ITEM_CODE, MAX(APPLY_DATE) AS APPLY_DATE FROM FSI_ITEM_FEATURE WHERE CENTER_CODE = '300001' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN APPLY_DATE AND TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(APPLY_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),1)-1,'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY CENTER_CODE, CUSTCD, ITEM_CODE) GROUP BY ITEM_CODE ) ) D ,(SELECT RESTRICT_SEQ, ITEM_CODE, RESTRICT_START, RESTRICT_END, RESTRICT_REASON FROM FSI_RESTRICT_MST WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN RESTRICT_START AND RESTRICT_END AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) F WHERE A.ITEM_CODE = B.ITEM_CODE(+) AND A.ITEM_CODE = C.ITEM_CODE(+) AND A.ITEM_CODE = D.ITEM_CODE(+) AND A.ITEM_CODE = F.ITEM_CODE(+) ----------- AND NVL(B.MARGIN_PRICE,0) > 0 ----------- -- AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM HLDC_PO_TREAT_UPJANG Z WHERE Z.UPJANG = 100751 AND Z.ITEM_CODE = A.ITEM_CODE) AND EXISTS ( /* SELECT 1 FROM HLDC_PO_CONTRACT_F Z, PO_TREAT_UPJANG_V Y --SELECT 1 FROM HLDC_PO_CONTRACT_F Z, HLDC_PO_TREAT_UPJANG Y WHERE Z.CENTER_CODE = Y.CENTER_CODE AND Z.CUSTCD = Y.CUSTCD AND Z.ITEM_CODE = Y.ITEM_CODE AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN Z.CONTRACT_START AND NVL(Z.CONTRACT_END,'99999999') AND Z.CONTRACT_PRICE != 0 AND Z.USE_YN = 'Y' AND Y.UPJANG = (SELECT DISTINCT ATTR02 FROM FMI_STD_PRICE) AND Y.ITEM_CODE = A.ITEM_CODE -- '010603900003' */ SELECT 1 FROM HLDC_PO_CONTRACT_F Z WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN Z.CONTRACT_START AND NVL(Z.CONTRACT_END,'99999999') AND Z.CONTRACT_PRICE != 0 AND Z.USE_YN = 'Y' AND Z.UPJANG = (SELECT DISTINCT ATTR02 FROM FMI_STD_PRICE) AND Z.ITEM_CODE = A.ITEM_CODE -- '010603900003' )
